thread.title: Sheri
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Sheri

author: Sheri
title: Sheri
text: Ordered trainers in store Saturday pm and promptly delivered Monday morning. What an excellent, swift, efficient (and at no extra cost) service. Staff member was super polite and helpful as I explained my son autistic and sensory (wears no socks). My son is extremely pleased with his birthday gift. Thank you. Highly recommend x
